name: Baloon Game
description:
A simple baloon game for just unity practice. Intented to make a simple android game. For now until I install jdk and ndk packages it will be asimple PC game.

Green Balloons = 5 Points
Blue Balloons = 1 Points
Black Balloons = -2 Points
The game ends when you reach 50 points. If you miss any colored baloons you will lose 1 point per balloon.
